raw_glosses: (South Korea, Yanbian) Germany (a country in Central Europe, formed in 1949 as West Germany, with its provisional capital Bonn until 1990, when it incorporated East Germany)
glosses: Germany (a country in Central Europe, formed in 1949 as West Germany, with its provisional capital Bonn until 1990, when it incorporated East Germany)

etymology_text: Sino-Korean word from 獨逸, an orthographic borrowing from Japanese 獨逸 (Doitsu, “Germany”), from Dutch Duits (“German”).

etymology_templates.name: obor
etymology_templates.expansion: orthographic borrowing from Japanese 獨逸 (Doitsu, “Germany”)
